decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (JGD/HAG/002_01 Rev. 01, JGD/HAG/002_02 Rev. 01, JGD/HAG/002_03 Rev. 01, JGD/HAG/002_04 Rev. 01, JGD/HAG/002_05 Rev. 01, JGD/HAG/002_06 Rev. 01, JGD/HAG/002_07 Rev. 01, Unnumbered location plan, Unnumbered block plan. Received: 16/02/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Enlargement of a rear roof extension incorporating two front roof windows to the house
